mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer( customer_id, customer_pw ) VALUES( #{customerId}, PASSWORD(#{customerPw}) )

INSERT INTO customer_detail( customer_no, customer_name, customer_gender, customer_height, customer_weight, customer_birth, customer_phone, customer_address, customer_email ) VALUES( #{customerNo}, #{customerName}, #{customerGender}, #{customerHeight}, #{customerWeight}, #{customerBirth}, #{customerPhone}, #{customerAddress}, #{customerEmail} )

INSERT INTO customer_img( customer_no, customer_img_origin_name, customer_img_file_name, customer_img_size, customer_img_type ) VALUES( #{customerNo}, #{customerImgOriginName}, #{customerImgFileName}, #{customerImgSize}, #{customerImgType} )
mapper.select: SELECT customer_no FROM customer WHERE customer_id = #{customerId}
SELECT customer_no FROM customer_detail WHERE customer_email = #{customerEmail}
